name: bicycle
effect: Increases movement speed outside or in caves.  In high gear, allows the trainer to hop over some rocks and ascend muddy slopes.

flavor_text_entries.emerald:
A folding bicycle
that is faster than
the RUNNING SHOES.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
A folding bicycle that allows
faster movement than the RUNNING
SHOES.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
A folding Bicycle that enables much
faster movement than the Running
Shoes.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
A folding Bicycle that enables much
faster movement than the Running
Shoes.
flavor_text_entries.heartgold-soulsilver:
A folding Bicycle that enables much
faster movement than the Running
Shoes.
flavor_text_entries.black-white:
A folding Bicycle that enables much
faster movement than the Running
Shoes.
flavor_text_entries.black-2-white-2:
A folding Bicycle that enables much
faster movement than the Running
Shoes.
flavor_text_entries.x-y:
A folding Bicycle that enables a rider
to get around much faster than a pair
of Running Shoes will allow.
